title: Paranoid Android Sapphire Beta announced, OTA updates could come w/ donation support
content:
The developers behind the popular Paranoid Android third-party ROM have confirmed that the Sapphire Beta is set to launch this week, with OTA support potentially arriving dependent on community donation support.

moreâ€¦

The post Paranoid Android Sapphire Beta announced, OTA updates could come w/ donation support appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The Paranoid Android Sapphire Beta is set to launch this week, with OTA support likely arriving but dependent on community donation support.
